title: Frontend Fundamentals
description: Test your knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

questions.prompt: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: The <a> tag defines a hyperlink in HTML.

questions.prompt: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.
questions.explanation: CSS is the acronym for Cascading Style Sheets.
Primitives include string, number, boolean, null, undefined, symbol, and bigint.

questions.prompt: Name a CSS layout system used to build two-dimensional grids.
questions.explanation: CSS Grid is a two-dimensional layout system.
